projects.name: B-Tap
description: A mobile app that utilizes the Nearby Connections API for instant attendance tracking in classes
Employs an advertise-discover communication model where the teacher is an advertiser and the students are discoverers
Teacher can initiate the attendance process and can also export the attendance as a CSV file; Students can mark attendance with just a tap of a button
The project was presented at the IoT Expo organized by AICTE SPICES
